title: NLCS: Seranthony Dominguez Leads a Rebuilt Phillies Bullpen
description: Seranthony Domínguez is doing his best Tug McGraw impression, José Alvarado has pitched in every Phillies win and a team’s weakness in past years has become its strength.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:credit: Bill Streicher/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Seranthony Domínguez locked down a two-inning save in Game 3 of the National League Championship Series on Friday.
